skillTree.name: Screaming Bell
skillTree.description: An unholy battle altar dedicated to the Great Horned Rat, its ominous tolling strikes awe into evil Skaven hearts and fear into their opponents.

skillTree.name: Warpstone Tokens
skillTree.description: As an aid to spellcasting, they are peerless. It is highly dangerous, of course, but a sure-fire route to limitless power.

skillTree.name: Sneaky
skillTree.description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!

skillTree.name: Tricksy
skillTree.description: All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Voice of the Horned Rat
skillTree.description: All the hate, envy, and malice uttered in prayer each day, returned a thousand-fold.

skillTree.name: Envoy of the Council
skillTree.description: Skaven society is a tyranny moderated by assassination; this one is its ambassador.

skillTree.name: Dried Mushrooms
skillTree.description: This one is clever-smart. Food-rations preserved and brought along with army to feed the clanrats, yes-yes!

skillTree.name: Quick Paws
skillTree.description: Grab-carry more-more! Take all!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

skillTree.name: Gutter Runner Scouts
skillTree.description: Spot-find their armies, loot-take their supplies!

skillTree.name: Slave Taskmasters
skillTree.description: Skavenslaves must carry supplies, carve out under-caverns, and fight on the frontline. Then, they might be given some food (probably dead skavenslaves).

effects.description:
Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Fresh Meat
skillTree.description: Captives make the best meals.

skillTree.name: Tail Weapon
skillTree.description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pestilent Breath"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pestilent Breath Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Pestilent Breath Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Bless with Filth"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Bless with Filth Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Bless with Filth Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wither Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Plague Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Dreaded Thirteenth
skillTree.description: A terrible bell chimes from afar. By its thirteenth toll, Skaven have been brought forth through a hole in reality.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 0 damage and 100 25 explosion damage (20m)

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Dreaded Thirteenth Spell Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 0 damage and 100 25 explosion damage (20m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 0 damage and 100 25 explosion damage (20m)

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Dreaded Thirteenth Spell Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 0 0 damage and 100 25 explosion damage (20m)

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to "The Dreaded Thirteenth Spell Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Dreaded Thirteenth Spell"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Pack Leader
skillTree.description: To rise above the rank and file, to claw one's way above the mire and the filth, takes a certain, superior breed of Skaven.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Clanrats units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Clanrats units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Clanrats units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Infiltrator
skillTree.description: Having to hide, for an extended period, in a dark, dank recess, in order to entrap and kill your target encourages lateral thinking.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +5% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +7% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blastmaster
skillTree.description: Knowing exactly where and when to strike is essential when fielding fiendish, potentially battle-winning plague-weapons.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Skaven Weapon Team units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Skaven Weapon Team units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +7% for Skaven Weapon Team units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Skaven Weapon Team units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Skaven Weapon Team units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Respected & Feared
skillTree.description: Is it better to be respected or feared? What sort of question is that... why, both of course!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for Stormvermin, Death Runners, Plague Monks and Eshin Triads units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Stormvermin, Death Runners, Plague Monks and Eshin Triads units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Stormvermin, Death Runners, Plague Monks and Eshin Triads units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Stormvermin, Death Runners, Plague Monks and Eshin Triads units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Stormvermin, Death Runners, Plague Monks and Eshin Triads units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Moulder Knowledge
skillTree.description: This one has seen the hideous deformities created by Clan Moulder firsthand and now fancies himself a dab hand with a needle and thread…

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Engineering Skill
skillTree.description: This one's intimate knowledge of the inner workings of Skaven machinery enables him to improve their efficiency on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5% for Doomwheel and Doom-Flayers units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +5% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Doomwheel, Doom-Flayers and Warp-Grinders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10% for Doomwheel and Doom-Flayers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +7% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Doomwheel, Doom-Flayers and Warp-Grinders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20% for Doomwheel and Doom-Flayers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Whip-Smart
skillTree.description: The wise commander considers the lash a dear friend - so much more than a motivational tool to encourage correctness in spirit and behaviour.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Skavenslaves, Clanrats and Stormvermin units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Skavenslaves, Clanrats and Stormvermin units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Skavenslaves, Clanrats and Stormvermin units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Gutter-Wise
skillTree.description: Early years spent in the gutter both prepares the ambitious rat for power and schools him in the dirtier, more cut-throat ways of war.

effects.description:
Range: +15% for Gutter Runners and Night Runners (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Gutter Runners, Night Runners, Death Runners and Eshin Triads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Warp-Smart
skillTree.description: This one knows just what to say to 'encourage' the very best work from his underling Warp-smiths and technicians.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Doomwheel, Doom-Flayers and Warp-Grinders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Skaven Weapon Team, Doomwheel, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Skaven Weapon Team, Doom-Flayer, Doomwheel, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Skaven Weapon Team, Doom-Flayers, Doomwheel, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mutagenic Elixirs
skillTree.description: Potions infused with Warpstone transmogrify the not-always-willing testbed subjects; those who survive the process emerge stronger and better in every way.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror, Hell Pit Abomination and Plague Monks units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror, Hell Pit Abomination and Plague Monks units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror, Hell Pit Abomination and Plague Monks units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dictatorial
skillTree.description: Keeping on top of things with an iron fist prevents Skavendom from becoming too much of a degenerate mess.

skillTree.name: Corruptive
skillTree.description: Naturally, rats get in everywhere – even the tiniest opening presents little obstacle – spreading their disease and corruption everywhere they can.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: "Miiine All Miiine!"
skillTree.description: When making corpses of your foes, leave nothing of value for their kin to recover.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp Claws
backgroundSkills.description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp Teeth
backgroundSkills.description: "When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."

backgroundSkills.name: Sneaky
backgroundSkills.description: By their very nature, rats are very sneaky - even sneakier than Goblins. In fact, they're probably the sneakiest of all.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Warpstone Hoarder
backgroundSkills.description: "Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +4
	(all armies factionwide)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Filthy
backgroundSkills.description: Ugly? Yes. But tasty!

backgroundSkills.name: Distant Sight
backgroundSkills.description: Not really.

backgroundSkills.name: Slave Master
backgroundSkills.description: Slaves listen but none else.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +10 for Skavenslaves units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Abominations
backgroundSkills.description: Ugh, scary but efficent.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Rat Ogres and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Shiny
backgroundSkills.description: Shiny Things!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +25%

backgroundSkills.name: Shoot!
backgroundSkills.description: Yes! Shoot them from afar!

effects.description:
Upkeep: +10% for Skaven Weapon Team units
	(all units in army)

Range: +20% for Skaven Weapon Team units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Strong legs
backgroundSkills.description: To run-flee!

backgroundSkills.name: Warp Armour
backgroundSkills.description: Slow but good to get some nasty hits.
